DOC.brief_summary: There were no differences in the degree of enamel remineralization of subsurface lesions among the chewing gums containing or not containing POs-Ca and fluoride.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of a Chewing Gum Containing POs-Ca and Fluoride on Enamel
DOC.criteria: healthy adult subjects More than 22 permanent teeth Alcohol addiction Smoking Active caries Periodontal pockets Lowsaliva flow (less than 0.3ml/min)
